titles.title: Financial Stability Mandate Act
Financial Stability Mandate Act
To require the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and the Federal Open Market Committee to consider inflation, employment, and financial stability when setting interest rates.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Financial Stability Mandate Act
This bill requires the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and the Federal Open Market Committee to consider inflation, employment, and financial stability when setting interest rates.
